about_the_game:
Avast ye! Set sail on a thrilling adventure with Dice Captain, a roguelike game that will give you endless excitement on the high seas. In this maritime journey, you'll chart your course through ever-changing waters, build a crew of unique sailors, and master the art of strategy with a combination of talismans, artifacts, and one-time-use cards, all to become the most powerful and respected pirate Captain.


Your ship's success relies on the diverse talents of your crew. Choose your sailors wisely, each equipped with a unique, upgradeable dice. Shape your ship's destiny with sharpshooters that never miss or experienced carpenters capable of strengthening your ship.


Find your winning strategy by experimenting with various combinations of talismans and artifacts. These mystical items possess unique features, enabling you to adapt your tactics to any situation. Mix and match talismans to create a build that suits your playstyle.


In the heat of battle, one-time-use cards become your secret weapon. These cards grant you the powers of both sailors and talismans, offering an extra layer of strategy to every encounter. Use them wisely to turn the tide of battle, unlock hidden pathways, or overcome challenging obstacles.


Each playthrough reveals new, unexplored places, challenging your skills and luck in dangerous turn-based battles, mysterious islands and stormy seas.


Sometimes decisions have consequences, and the outcome can be unpredictable. Find the most effective way to obtain all the treasures without attracting powerful enemies in your adventures!


Use your hard-earned global currency to make your journey easier. Invest in additional crew members, secure places for powerful talismans, and reinforce your ship's durability, all to shape your destiny.


Dice Captain is a dice-powered roguelike adventure that will test your adaptability, tactical skills, and decision-making ability in unpredictable situations. Are you ready to become the greatest pirate captain of all time and sail into the unknown? Start your journey today in the world of Dice Captain!
